1.1: The Elder to the elect Lady, and her children, whom I love in the truth: and not I only, but also all that have known the truth,
1.2: For the truthâ€™s sake which dwelleth in us, and shall be with us forever:
1.3: Grace be with you, mercy and peace from God the Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ the Son of the Father, with truth and love.
1.4: I rejoiced greatly, that I found of thy children walking in truth, as we have received a commandment of the Father.
1.5: And now beseech I thee, Lady, (not as writing a new commandment unto thee, but the same which we had from the beginning) that we love one another.
1.6: And this is that love that we should walk after his commandments. This commandment is, that as ye have heard from the beginning, ye should walk in it.
1.7: For many deceivers are entered into this world, which confess not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh. He that is such one, is a deceiver and an Antichrist.
1.8: Look to yourselves, that we lose not the things, which we have done, but that we may receive a full reward.
1.9: Whosoever transgresseth, and abideth not in the doctrine of Christ, hath not God. He that continueth in the doctrine of Christ, he hath both the Father and the Son.
1.10: If there come any unto you, and bring not this doctrine, receive him not to house, neither bid him Godspeed.
1.11: For he that biddeth him Godspeed, is partaker of his evil deeds. Although I had many things to write unto you, yet would I not write with paper and ink: but I trust to come unto you, and speak mouth to mouth, that our joy may be full.
1.12: The sons of thine elect sister greet thee, Amen.
